title: Why Being On A Diet Is Not Selfish
itunes:title: Why Being On A Diet Is Not Selfish
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

Today we talk about feeling selfish. So many of us think that the steps we are taking to lose weight take time away from what we "should be doing."

We break it down into four areas:what happens when those you love may not be on board, loved ones who are disappointed when we don't want to make the same unhealthy choices, whether our new choices make others uncomfortable, and fear of losing friends who don't share our new way of life.
